author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
Learn to build scalable backend applications with NestJS, one of the most popular Node.js frameworks. Harness its modular architecture, TypeScript support, and built-in tools to create clean, testable, code.

✏️ Study this course interactively on Scrimba: 
https://scrimba.com/nestjs-c0n7djgjma?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=fcc-nestjs

Scrimba on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Scrimba

⭐️ Contents ⭐️
- 0:00:00 Why NestJS?
- 0:03:40 DevMatch - A Dating App For Developers
- 0:05:08 Setup
- 0:07:21 Modules & Decorators
- 0:10:18 Controller (GET) All Profiles
- 0:15:00 Controller (GET) Single Profile
- 0:17:24 Controller (POST)
- 0:23:35 Controller (PUT)
- 0:26:19 Controller (DELETE)
- 0:29:37 Service (Get All Profiles)
- 0:32:59 Service (Get Single Profile)
- 0:36:49 Service (Create Profile)
- 0:46:01 Service (Update Profile)
- 0:51:20 Service (Remove Profile)
- 0:54:47 Exception Filters - Bubbling Up
- 1:02:34 Exception Filters - Challenges
- 1:07:00 Handling excep
title: NestJS Course for Beginners - Build Server-Side Applications

author: freeCodeCamp.org
description: AI tools can be super helpful when used correctly - but just remember: they're merely another tool in your broad developer toolbox. They're not the answer to everything. Ania discusses this with Quincy on the freeCodeCamp podcast.
title: AI tools can be super helpful - but they're not the answer to everything
